name: My Daughter Ava
description:
Ava Anderson was murdered by her father over spilt soda and as an act of vengeance, decides to return to him in the after world to haunt him and make him face the same fate she did all those years ago...

Use anything you can to defend yourself, pickup anything and toss it with no care.

Move WASD TossLMB DropRMB Interact/PickupE Skip J

Music Used:

"Loopable Horror Track" by Muncheybobo

"Horror Music" by Lisboa

This game was supposed to be finished in two weeks as a challenge myself, but it took nearly 4 months due to me starting school again. Its a parody of both "silent hill" and "PT" and it is not made to be taken seriously, just some fun I had in unity. Also if this game makes no sense to you at all, its because its one huge inside joke between my friends. If your curious about the lore of this, trust me it gets pretty deep.
